item.title: Russia, Iran, Venezuela Confound Oil Output Forecasts
item.description: The International Energy Agency (IEA) has lifted its forecast for Russian, Iranian, and Venezuelan output in 2023 by a combined 1.3 million barrels a day, reaching an annual average of 14.3 million barrels a day, according to a recent article on Bloomberg 1.
